name: Gambadoo
description:
Before happening upon this jam I was actually wanting to make a simple mobile game involving a frog girl. So I decided to enter this jam and prototype the idea I had to see if it could be any fun. 

Because I saw this as more of an experiment of an idea than a serious attempt at making a game I made just one level and one enemy. And the powerups or minimal. But it's not as if I could do much else in just 3 days.

Credits

Music by Abstraction: http://www.abstractionmusic.com/
